semigroups
Class Selector

java.lang.Object
  semigroups.Selector

public class Selector
extends java.lang.Object

A Java Class to represent a selector. A selector is defined with the equality \lambda_\alpha \lambda_\beta = K_{\alpha \beta}^\gamma \lambda_\gamma. Its use is very convenient to describe S-expansions. The components of a selector can only take the values 0 or 1.

Author:
fnadal

selectorMetric

public Jama.Matrix selectorMetric()

show

public void show()
Shows the selector in a fancy way. It shows n boxes of dimension nxn, so the component K_{ab}^c is found in box a, row b, column c.
